$schema.title: JSON Schema
$schema.description: Reference to JSON schema of this config

allowed_iss.description: Allowed values of the iss token claim.

userid_claims.description: Token claims keys which can contain the userid. The first non-empty claim value is used.

displayname_claims.description: Token claims keys which can contain the display name. The first non-empty claim value is used. If an array is specified, the claim values are used if all are not None, and joined by a whitespace.

userid_verify_sql.description: Query which verifies whether the userid exist. Must contain the :id placeholder

tenant_header_name.description: Name of tenant header to set when redirecting on successfull mysoch-auth

tenant_header_value.description: Value of tenant header to set when redirecting on successfull mysoch-auth

max_token_duration.description: Maximum allowed JWT token validity duration (exp - nbf), in seconds. Default: 60
